entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount possibly reaching 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
